results.title: Metformin regulates the LIN28B-mediated JNK/STAT3 signaling pathway through miR-140-3p in subretinal fibrosis
results.text_hl: The effects in the @<m>DISEASE_White_Dot_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080363 @@@SF@@@ group were reversed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (Fig. 1E).
